node.title: I'm not going to [http://braga.yapceurope.org/|YAPC Europe: Braga, Portugal], because
node.author: cog

data.field: I spent all my money elsewhere (comment below) I don't like good food I don't like good desserts I don't like the idea of three days of Perl They won't let me (comment below) I don't like good weather I don't like cheap beer I don't want to meet all you guys What do you mean, not going? I voted for [http://braga.yapceurope.org/index.cgi?TheFishnetsIncident|fishnets]
